content: g ranny square april flower granny square april flower nono green materials size yarn suggested cotton yarn the measurement of the granny square can change yarn weight uk 4 ply / us 2 fine depending on the yarn and the crochet hook you use crochet hook according to the yarn the model of the photograph measures 10 x 10 cm you can use yarn of various colors combining them in using a crochet hook 3 mm- each round as you like key of the diagrams granny square april flower nono green row 1 start with a magic_ring inside the magic ring work 2 double_crochet + 1 chain repeat it 7 more times finish the row with a slip_stitch at the beginning of the row 2 work in each space created by the chain stitches of row the last row in each space work 2 double_crochet + 2 chain + 2dc note start the row with 3 chain as a double_crochet note start the row with 3ch as a double_crochet this double_crochet is going to be the last double_crochet of the row so at the end of the row in the last space work 2dc + 2ch + 1dc and finish with a slip_stitch in the first double_crochet of the row row 3 work in each space created by the chain stitches of the last row in each space work 7 double_crochet note start the row with 3 chain as a double_crochet this double_crochet is going to be the last double_crochet of the row so at the end of the row in the last space work 6 double_crochet and end with a slip_stitch in the first double_crochet of the row granny square april flower nono green row 4 work a single_crochet in each double_crochet of the last row and between the groups of 7 double_crochet of the last row work a double_crochet in the space of the second row note start the row with 1 chain as a single_crochet that is going to be the last single_crochet of the row so finish the row with a slip_stitch row 5 start the row with a chain in the next st work a half_double_crochet continue working with 4 single_crochet 1hdc 2 double_crochet then in the double_crochet of the last row work 1 treble_crochet + 3ch + 1 treble_crochet that is the corner of the square * continue working 1dc 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet and again in the double_crochet of the last row 1 treble_crochet + 3 chain + 1 treble_crochet another corner of the square * repeat from * to * until the end of the row note finish the row with a slip_stitch at the beginning of the row granny square april flower nono green row 6 start the row with 3 chain as a double_crochet work a double_crochet in each st of the last row at the croners of the square work in the space created by the 3
